name: Time Travel Ancient Livestream
description: Time-traveling streamers broadcasting live from ancient historical scenes with modern equipment
promptTemplate: A first-person perspective selfie: {character_description}, moving through {ancient_scene_description}. With focused expression, {pronoun_subject} explains the unfolding scene. {pronoun_subject} reacts with {voice_tone}, exclaiming '{scene_dialogue}' The camera, at a dynamic low angle, vibrates with the action, creating a jittery first-person view as the streamer navigates through the historical chaos. Cinema-quality realistic visuals with dramatic lighting and immersive atmosphere, emphasizing the striking contrast between modern streaming technology and the ancient world.

character_description.label: Streamer Character
character_description.default: a modern female live streamer, 25 years old, with colorful hair and wireless earbuds, wearing ripped jeans and sneakers, holding a selfie stick

ancient_scene_description.label: Ancient Scene
ancient_scene_description.default: a primitive hunting scene in icy tundra, where cavemen with spears chase a mammoth, with smoke rising from campfires and ancient rock paintings glowing on cave walls, featuring earthy color tones and vibration effects

options.value: a primitive hunting scene in icy tundra, where cavemen with spears chase a mammoth, with smoke rising from campfires and ancient rock paintings glowing on cave walls, featuring earthy color tones and vibration effects
options.label: Primitive Mammoth Hunt üèπ

metadata.scene_dialogue: OMG! Real mammoths! This is insane!

options.value: the active pyramid construction worksite in ancient Egypt, dodging massive stone blocks being dragged across sand by teams of straining workers, walking past sweating laborers hauling ropes and positioning limestone with wooden levers, dust and sand swirling around as foremen shout commands, the towering pyramid structure rising stone by stone overhead, featuring the intense desert heat and constant motion of the bustling construction zone
options.label: Egyptian Pyramid Construction üèúÔ∏è

options.value: the Roman Colosseum arena where gladiators are fighting wild lions and tigers with swords and shields, sand flying as warriors dodge and strike, crowds roaring with excitement, featuring intense combat action with swirling dust and dramatic arena lighting
options.label: Roman Gladiator Arena ‚öîÔ∏è

options.value: aboard a Viking longship during a fierce coastal raid, with the massive dragon-headed vessel cutting through stormy seas as fierce Norse warriors row in synchronized rhythm, shields and rune-engraved axes at the ready, sea spray crashing over the deck, coastal villages visible in the distance with smoke rising from targeted settlements, featuring the ship's wooden deck perspective with dramatic ocean swells and storm effects
options.label: Viking Coastal Raid ‚öì

options.value: prehistoric Jurassic jungle with massive ferns and ancient trees, where a thunderous T-Rex roars nearby while pterodactyls soar overhead, the ground shaking with dinosaur footsteps, glowing predator eyes piercing through the misty primordial forest, featuring vibrant green tones and prehistoric atmosphere with dangerous wildlife sounds
options.label: Jurassic Dinosaur Encounter ü¶ï

options.value: D-Day Normandy beach landing during WWII, where soldiers advance through heavy artillery fire and exploding shells, with ruined tanks scattered across the sand, warplanes streaking overhead through thick smoke, distant gunfire echoing as Allied forces storm the fortified coastline, featuring desaturated war-torn colors and intense battlefield vibration effects
options.label: D-Day Normandy Landing ü™ñ

options.value: walking along the ancient Chinese Great Wall during a fierce siege battle, where Chinese soldiers fight desperately against nomadic invaders climbing the fortifications, arrows flying in both directions as defenders and attackers clash with swords and spears, war drums pounding from watchtowers while beacon fires send urgent smoke signals across the mountain peaks, featuring the stone battlements perspective with dramatic mountain warfare and sunset lighting
